name: EM: Freedom Awaits Edition
description:
Here's the EM: Freedom Awaits Edition! It's a modified version of Tic's Expedition Mod.

Its new features are:

  • Auto name loader
  • Auto darkness disable
  • Interpolation
  • Raised character stats
  • Non shitty default UI settings

Credits to Sonicv6 for developing all the cool features.
